citations.narrative:
The sheep pasture immediately adjacent to the barn contains a heap of fencing material with multiple mangled, projecting
wires. There is also a section of the barn's metal wall panel that has been bent outwards, creating an opening in the wall
and exposing the curved edge to the pasture. The fencing material and metal panel damage can entrap or injure animals
in the pasture. Buildings and grounds of the premises must be kept clean and in good repair to protect animals from
injury.
Correct by August 19, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
The sheep pasture immediately adjacent to the barn contains a heap of fencing material with multiple mangled, projecting 
wires. There is also a section of the barn's metal wall panel that has been bent outwards, creating an opening in the wall 
and exposing the curved edge to the pasture. The fencing material and metal panel damage can entrap or injure animals 
in the pasture. Buildings and grounds of the premises must be kept clean and in good repair to protect animals from 
injury.  
 
Correct by August 19, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
